text: Rory Thornton (born 16 March 1995) is a Welsh rugby union player who plays for the Cardiff Blues. His position is lock forward. Thornton began his rugby career at Bonymaen RFC before joining the Swansea RFC and then the Ospreys. Thornton joined the Cardiff blues on a season long loan prior to the 2018-2019 Pro 14 season and then signed a permanent contract with Cardiff for the following season. ==International== Thornton captained the Wales Under 20 team. In January 2014 he was called up to the Wales national rugby union team training squad for the 2015 Rugby World Cup.Wales world cup training squad In May 2017 he was named in the Wales senior squad for the tests against Tonga and Samoa in June 2017Wales squad June 2017 == References == == External links == * Ospreys profile *Cardiff Blues profile Category:Rugby union players from Swansea Category:Welsh rugby union players Category:Ospreys (rugby union) players Category:Swansea RFC players Category:Living people Category:1995 births
title: Rory Thornton
